Bonjour.

I am Astrid Le Quéré, a happy User Experience Designer.

In addition to my studies in Social Sciences as well as my strong understanding of the business and digital ecosystems, I decided to pick up some solid Design and Design skills. I added a sprinkle of Research, and voilà! Used to combine my analytical mind with my creativity and my social personality to reach my goals, I'm always looking for new and exciting opportunities.

Don't hesitate to get in touch!
